bug.author: yaroslavvb
bug.summary: "TypeError: string indices must be integers" when calling wandb.save from notebook
bug.description:
In this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wandb/client/blob/386196e383982918f688f99b398ede4cb85b476b/wandb/jupyter.py#L100>line</denchmark-link> , nn is a string instead of dictionary, so wandb crashes Jupyter 4.4.0 <denchmark-code>Automatic pdb calling has been turned ON --------------------------------------------------------------------------- AttributeError Traceback (most recent call last) ~/anaconda3/envs/main/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wandb/meta.py in setup(self) 46 import __main__ ---> 47 self.data["program"] = __main__.__file__ 48 except (ImportError, AttributeError):
AttributeError: module '__main__' has no attribute '__file__'
During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
TypeError Traceback (most recent call last) <ipython-input-16-396ff2e31a0d> in <module> 1 get_ipython().run_line_magic('pdb', '') ----> 2 wandb.save('/tmp/nccl.txt')
~/anaconda3/envs/main/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wandb/__init__.py in save(glob_str, base_path, policy) 402 return [] 403 run.send_message( --> 404 {"save_policy": {"glob": wandb_glob_str, "policy": policy}}) 405 files = [] 406 for path in glob.glob(glob_str):
~/anaconda3/envs/main/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wandb/wandb_run.py in send_message(self, options) 161 elif self._jupyter_agent: 162 # Running in jupyter --> 163 self._jupyter_agent.start() 164 if options.get("save_policy"): 165 self._jupyter_agent.rm.update_user_file_policy(
~/anaconda3/envs/main/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wandb/jupyter.py in start(self) 110 def start(self): 111 if self.paused: --> 112 self.rm = RunManager(wandb.run, output=False) 113 wandb.run.api._file_stream_api = None 114 self.rm.mirror_stdout_stderr()
~/anaconda3/envs/main/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wandb/run_manager.py in __init__(self, run, project, tags, cloud, output, port) 454 # Calling .start() on _meta and _system_stats will spin a thread that reports system stats every 30 seconds 455 self._system_stats = stats.SystemStats(run, self._api) --> 456 self._meta = meta.Meta(self._api, self._run.dir) 457 self._meta.data["jobType"] = self._run.job_type 458 self._meta.data["mode"] = self._run.mode
~/anaconda3/envs/main/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wandb/meta.py in __init__(self, api, out_dir) 34 self.data = {} 35 self.lock = threading.Lock() ---> 36 self.setup() 37 self._thread = threading.Thread(target=self._thread_body) 38 self._thread.daemon = True
~/anaconda3/envs/main/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wandb/meta.py in setup(self) 49 self.data["program"] = '<python with no main file>' 50 if wandb._get_python_type() != "python": ---> 51 meta = wandb.jupyter.notebook_metadata() 52 if meta.get("path"): 53 if "fileId=" in meta["path"]:
~/anaconda3/envs/main/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wandb/jupyter.py in notebook_metadata() 98 return {} 99 for nn in res: --> 100 if nn['kernel']['id'] == kernel_id: 101 return {"root": s['notebook_dir'], "path": nn['notebook']['path'], "name": nn['notebook']['name']} 102 return {}
TypeError: string indices must be integers
> /Users/yaroslavvb/anaconda3/envs/main/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wandb/jupyter.py(100)notebook_metadata() 98 return {} 99 for nn in res: --> 100 if nn['kernel']['id'] == kernel_id: 101 return {"root": s['notebook_dir'], "path": nn['notebook']['path'], "name": nn['notebook']['name']} 102 return {}
ipdb> p nn 'message' </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.99. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/wandb/client>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Oooo, yeah this is gnarley one. I'll work on a fix.

Just pushed a fix to master: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wandb/client/commit/6d4be1764511c6986bc9038a8d03e9e91a611034>6d4be17</denchmark-link>
You can install with pip install --upgrade git+git://github.com/wandb/client.git@master#egg=wandb we'll hopefully cut a new release yet this week!

<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23068/60524621-c200a280-9ca1-11e9-9840-0581ba7d88c3.png></denchmark-link>
I've been adding Type Annotations to everything to catch these errors, maybe wouldn't work in this case though
